text: is a former Japanese football player. She played for the Japan national team. ==Biography== Takashima played for Nadeshiko League club Nissan FC. She was selected Fighting Spirit prize in 1993 season. However, the club was disbanded in 1993. She moved to Shiroki FC Serena in 1994. On August 21, 1994, Takashima debuted for the Japan national team against Austria. ==Statistics== Japan Football Association Japan national team Year Apps Goals 1994 1 0 Total 1 0 ==References== Category:Living people Category:Japan women's international footballers Category:Nadeshiko League players Category:Nissan FC Ladies players Category:Shiroki FC Serena players Category:1949 births Category:Association football forwards Category:Japan international footballers
title: Minako Takashima
